query.text: Load DNA Extraction Logs from 'knowrob_data' library
----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----

query.q: task(T), task_goal(T, 'GOAL-DUAL-ARM-MOVED-AT-LOCATIONS'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), add_trajectory('/r_gripper_tool_frame', S, E, 0.2).
task(T), task_goal(T, 'GOAL-SINGULAR-ARM-MOVED-AT-LOCATION'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), add_trajectory('/l_gripper_tool_frame', S, E, 0.2).
